about.mainStory: is an international fashion startup developing a multibrand store offering clothing, footwear, and accessories. Our selection features some of the most popular global brands, including H&M, Reserved, Sinsay, House, and more.
about.ourStory: Since 2023, we’ve been successfully selling on Wildberries, with exclusive supply partnerships. In 2025, we’re stepping into offline retail with the opening of our first store in Armenia.
about.ourMission: To make stylish, high-quality clothing accessible to everyone. Trendsetter is a flexible and ambitious brand, currently building a strong team and actively expanding across the region. We believe fashion should be simple, accessible, and inspiring — every single day.

faq.question: Our Story
faq.answer: Since 2023, we’ve been successfully selling on Wildberries, with exclusive supply partnerships. In 2025, we’re stepping into offline retail with the opening of our first store in Armenia.

faq.question: Our Mission
faq.answer: To make stylish, high-quality clothing accessible to everyone. Trendsetter is a flexible and ambitious brand, currently building a strong team and actively expanding across the region. We believe fashion should be simple, accessible, and inspiring — every single day.

shop.block1: Trendsetter Á Multibrand is a multibrand fashion store bringing together the world’s most loved clothing labels — from H&M to Reserved, Sinsay, and more.
shop.block2: We curate stylish, affordable, and ready-to-wear pieces that fit your everyday life. clusively available on Wildberries since 2023 — and now expanding offline in Armenia.
shop.block3: Global fashion, local access. Trendsetter makes it easy to wear what you love.
shop.block5: Underground Street on North Avenue Working hours 10:00-22:00 Tel. 012 202 202 North avenue 6/2, Yerevan, Armenia 0001
shop.textForProposal: Write to us if you have any questions!

amu.homeBlock1: At AMU, we specialize in essential everyday wear — timeless pieces that form the foundation of any modern wardrobe.
amu.homeBlock2: Inspired by global brands like H&M, Uniqlo, Zara, and Lululemon, we aim to create clothing that blends effortless style, quality, and functionality.
amu.homeBlock3: We focus on well-crafted basics that reflect current streetwear trends while staying true to minimalism and practicality.
amu.homeBlock5: All items come in solid colors, free from prints or patterns — versatile pieces designed to stay relevant season after season. We provide detailed size guides, including plus-size options, to ensure a great fit and inclusive sizing for everyone.
amu.homeBlock6: At AMU, we believe in clean, uncompromising style — in wardrobe essentials that move with you and fit every moment of your life.
amu.title: AMU
amu.block1TopLeftText: SIMPLICITY FOR PEOPLE WHO HAVE A LIFE
amu.block2Ranked: Ranked in the Top 100 Sellers. Over 550k units sold to date.
amu.block2HMaKey: H&M – A key brand in our portfolio
amu.block2MSaKay: Marks & Spencer – Coming soon to our offerings
amu.block2PartsOfTashir: Part of the Tashir Group of Companies, generating $1 billion in revenue
amu.block2Extensive: Extensive expertise in commercial real estate
amu.block2Owner: Owner of the 4 largest shopping malls in Armenia
amu.block2TheStoreWillOperate: The store will operate as a discounter, offering high-quality clothing and footwear
amu.block2Aimed: Aimed at providing affordable prices for the entire family
amu.block3WeAreReady: We’re ready to launch our own
amu.block5AMUFocuses: AMU focuses on basic bestsellers. Inspired by the brands such as H&M, Uniqlo, Zara and Lululemon, we are committed to delivering essential yet stylish clothing that combines uncompromising quality with streetwear trends. Our current product needs include:
amu.block5WeRequireAll: We require all items to be in plain colors, without additional prints, and to include comprehensive size charts that cover plus sizes. We aim to represent pure, uncompromising style, blending essential, liberating clothing with modern streetwear trends.

contact.block1: We’re always excited to hear from new customers and potential partners. Have a question, feedback, or a partnership inquiry? Just fill out the form, and a member of our team will get back to you as soon as possible
contact.block2Follow: Follow us on social media to stay updated on our latest news, collections, and exclusive offers.

cookie.banner: This website uses cookies to improve functionality and personalize your experience. By continuing to use the site, you agree to the processing of your data.
